item.description:
Rare opportunity to celebrate ...The Divine ...as we all gather together in sacred ceremony to help raise the consciousness of the planet....learn ancient healing modalities to heal our great Mother Earth ....and walk the Labyrinth into a new portal ...of light ....love..and healing...for yourself...humanity...and Mother Earth.


Ceremonialist and Shaman Healer Mary Beth Murawski Tenwhitefeathers
(Carries The Hopi Legend, Mayan Initiations) will lead the Ceremony.

Join us for this Fire Ceremony on Thursday July 19th at 7:00 pm
All who attend will receive Heart Blessings

Bring your drums and rattles!
Sage-ing in begins at 6:45

More on Mary Beth:
Http://www.oldwisdomteachings.com

Brought to you by Mia:

http://www.practical-alchemy.com

Space is limited - RSVP appreciated.

$20.00 cash at the door (pre-pay via Paypal also available- contact Mia)

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Park on High St, not Nahant Road. Put a note in car: Guest at 21 High St to avoid being ticketed

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: New Moon Sacred Healing Circle Nahant MA
